heroSubText: A safe and easy-to-use tool for storing account information and plastic cards.
simpleText: It is possible to store information about plastic cards
comfotableText: Available on any smartphone or an iOS and Android tablet
notesText: It is possible to make notes for each account
supportText: In the application, there is an opportunity to contact the support service directly in case of any questions
faq 4 title: Maximize the security of your accounts with Authopass
faq 1 subtext: AUTHOPASS is a simple and secure (with multi-level protection) place to store passwords for your accounts and information about bank cards. This function allows you to store and quickly access sensitive information regarding logging into your accounts, as well as the cards linked to them.
faq 2 subtext: With this function, you'll have a simple tool to control the security of your accounts. AUTHOPASS also helps store information about plastic cards, freeing you from worries during shopping. The Authopass feature (Password Generation) allows you to create random, complex, and secure passwords for your accounts. It provides automatic generation of unique combinations of characters, including uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, and special symbols.
faq 3 subtext: AUTHOPASS is your reliable guardian, ensuring the security and ease of managing your passwords and personal information, freeing you from unnecessary stress and memorizing passwords. This function helps ensure the maximum security of your accounts by preventing the use of weak or easily guessed passwords.
faq 4 subtext: According to the minimum acceptable standards, each of your accounts must have an individual, unique, and complex password. The AUTHOPASS tool will help create any password and protect your account. According to digital security standards, the password for each account should be changed every 3-6 months. With AUTHOPASS, you can easily and securely store passwords and information about your accounts in a convenient and secure format on your smartphone or tablet
Download subtitle: To use the AUTHOPASS feature, download and activate the app Scutum Mobile Security
License: License Agreement with the end user
Name: Name
failedPage text: The operation has been cancelled. No funds have been withdrawn from the account. Please try again.
